posts.name: Adam Benhrima
posts.heading: Match report v Putney St Germain
posts.body: Claremont Gorillas 17s returned to action against Putney St Germain on Saturday. It was over two years since our last victory against them, and always a fiercely contested match. We were also able to show off our fantastic new kit, kindly sponsored by The Albany - Great Portland Street

posts.name: Oliver Smith
posts.heading: CUP FINAL TONIGHT!
posts.body: 7:30PM Kick off in this evenings Wimbledon and District Cup Final - Claremont Gorillas 17 V South Wimbledon Dazzlers - Whyteleafe Football Club.

posts.name: Sam Ransom
posts.heading: Looking for a team?
posts.body: Want to join a men’s 11 a side football team? We are constantly looking for new players to join our teams.  We play in the Wimbledon & District League and have two teams and are a men’s 11 a side football team playing every Saturday.

posts.name: Adam Burns
posts.heading: 2 nil win over Northern Town!
posts.body: The 03s recorded an excellent 2-0 victory against Northern Town in the Championship, whilst the 17s lost 2-1 in a hard fought battle with South West dazzlers in the Prem.  It was great to see both teams back pitch side in our first league games in the Wimbledon & District League @ Home pitch at Regents Park
